message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe this is a fair price considering my budget and the value I've researched on similar products.
Bob, I understand your position, but $700,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could consider coming down to $900,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $900,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $850,000. This is my final offer.
